title: Converting Google PlayStore Gift Card to RP
body: Hello, I would like to know if there is any way to convert my Google PlayStore Gift Card to RP. I really want to buy the new Malz skin when it comes out, but I only have a 10$ LOL gift card, which is not enough(1350rp). If you guys know any way to convert the gift card, please tell me. Thanks.

replies.body: your $10 gift card should be enough. $10 gets you 1380 RP which is enough for the new Malz skin!

Hey, I double checked with a billing specialist but it doesn't look like that's currently a payment method.  Unless you have a trust friend who might be able to buy it off you, check out our [Buying RP](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/categories/115001242827) guide for some more options.  Good luck!
